title: Title
name: Name
helpBoatManning1: Click on a paddler in the list to select them.
helpBoatManning2: Then click on an empty seat in the boat.
helpBoatManningSwap: Click on another occupied seat to swap the paddlers.
helpBoatManning3: To remove someone, hover over the seat and click the small X.
helpBoatManning4: Use the pin needle (top left of seat) to lock a paddler. They won't be moved by Magic AI.
changeBoatSizeConfirm: Are you sure you want to change the boat size? The current lineup will be cleared.
helpBoatSizeDesc: Switch between Standard (20) and Small (10) boat. Each size has its own completely separate plan.
helpCalculationDesc: How Balance and Trim are calculated:
helpCalculation1: Standard (20): Split at middle (Rows 1-5 Front, 6-10 Back).
helpCalculation2: Small (10): Middle row (3) is excluded from Front/Back comparison to ensure fairness.
helpCalculation3: Drummer counts to Front, Steer counts to Back.
helpSpecialItems2: Guest: Add temporary paddlers not in the squad.
helpToolsStats1: Magic AI: The wand automatically fills the boat optimally.
helpToolsStats2: Trim: Use the slider to adjust target weight (Bow/Stern).
helpToolsStats3: Export: Save the lineup as an image.
helpManageEvents1: Create new trainings or regattas using the form on the left.
helpManageEvents2: Click Plan to start boat manning for an event.
helpManageEvents3: Manage attendance directly in the event list.
helpMembers1: Add new members using the form.
helpMembers2: Edit members by clicking the pencil icon in the squad list.
helpMembers3: Delete members with the trash icon (requires 2x confirmation).
helpToolsDesc: Use the slider for trim and Magic AI for auto-fill.
imprintResponsible: Responsible for content according to ¬ß 55 Abs. 2 RStV
tourWelcomeDesc: A short tour to show you the most important features.
tourNewEventDesc: Create a new training session or regatta here.
tourMembersDesc: Add new paddlers to your team here.
tourEventListDesc: Here you see all upcoming events. Click on one to plan.
tourSquadDesc: Overview of all your paddlers and their stats.
tourStatsDesc: Monitor balance and trim. Use tools like Magic AI or Export.
tourBoatSizeDesc: Switch between Standard (20) and Small (10) boat planning.
tourPoolDesc: Drag & Drop or click paddlers to assign them.
tourCanisterDesc: Add a dummy paddler (25kg) for balance.
tourGuestDesc: Add a guest paddler for this event only.
tourBoatDesc: Click seats to assign/unassign. Click two seats to swap.
tourMagicAIDesc: Let the AI fill the boat optimally.
tourExportDesc: Download the plan as an image.
clV210F1: You can now sign in with your Google or GitHub account.
clV210F2: Your profile picture is now displayed in the member list.
clV210F3: Paddlers can be linked to user accounts ‚Äì so you can see who belongs to which account.
clV210F4: Your settings (theme, language, active team) are now saved and available on all your devices.
clV210F5: Notifications now appear as beautiful popups instead of browser dialogs.
clV210T1: Unified input fields for better readability in dark mode.
clV210T2: Improved spacing and separators in the header area.
clV200F1: You can now manage multiple teams and switch between them.
clV200F2: New team management page: Create, edit, and delete teams.
clV200F3: Your data is now securely stored in the cloud ‚Äì no more data loss when switching browsers.
clV200F4: Teams can now be personalized with logo, website, and social media links.
clV200T1: Migrated from LocalStorage to PostgreSQL database.
clV200T2: PWA install button moved to footer.
clV200T3: Standardized page width across all pages.
clV170F1: New boat type: Small boat with 10 seats now available.
clV170F2: Standard and small boats have separate seating plans.
clV170F3: The balance display now shows more clearly how the weight is distributed.
clV160F1: Swap paddlers: Simply click on two occupied seats to swap the paddlers.
clV160F2: Selected paddlers are now highlighted even on occupied seats.
clV160T1: Improved help texts in planning mode.
clV150F1: New animated dragon boat graphic on the landing page.
clV150F2: The landing page now also supports dark mode.
clV150B1: The app now opens correctly when launched from the home screen.
clV140T1: Added API interface for automatic boat seating.
clV140T3: Introduced automated tests and quality assurance.
clV130F1: The app is now available in German and English.
clV130F3: Dark mode now automatically matches your system settings.
clV120F1: Interactive tutorials show you how everything works.
clV120F2: Help content now adapts to where you are in the app.
clV120F3: The automatic seating feature is now called "Magic AI".
clV120T1: All dialog windows now have a unified design.
clV110F1: New cleaner design in the header area.
clV100F1: Manage your team: Add paddlers and edit their data.
clV100F2: Plan trainings and regattas with attendance tracking.
clV100F3: Fill your boat via drag & drop or let Magic AI do it for you.
clV100F4: See at a glance how the weight is distributed in the boat.
imprintLiabilityContentText: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws pursuant to ¬ß 7 Para.1 TMG. According to ¬ß¬ß 8 to 10 TMG, however, we as a service provider are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information in accordance with general laws remain unaffected by this. However, liability in this respect is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific infringement. As soon as we become aware of such infringements, we will remove this content immediately.
imprintLiabilityLinksText: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. However, permanent monitoring of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of an infringement. As soon as we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
imprintCopyrightText: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use. Insofar as the content on this page was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are observed. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. As soon as we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
landingHeroSubtitle: The ultimate manager for Dragonboat teams. Plan trainings, manage lineups, and stay on top ‚Äì even offline.
landingFeaturesSubtitle: Focus on the sport, we'll handle the organization.
landingFeature1Desc: Install the app on your phone or computer.
landingFeature2Desc: Let the AI optimally fill your boat. Based on weight, side, and experience.
landingFeature3Desc: Manage your squad, track attendance, and plan the season like a pro.
deleteTeamWarning: Deleting a team will permanently remove all its paddlers and events.
weightDisclaimer: Your weight is visible only to team captains for boat balancing.
helpTeamEditGeneralDesc: Here you can manage the basic information of your team. Change the team name, update the website, or upload a new team logo to make your team recognizable. Social media links can also be managed here.
helpTeamEditMembersDesc: Manage who has access to your team here. You can invite new members via email. You can assign roles to existing members: 'Captain' for full administrative rights or 'Paddler' for regular team members. If necessary, you can also remove members.
errorUserNotFound: User not found. Please ask them to sign up first.
